context_bundle.summary: Domain-Driven Design models complex domains: Bounded Contexts (define boundaries), Entities (identity), Value Objects (no identity), Aggregates (consistency boundary), Repositories (persistence), Domain Events (communicate changes). Use Ubiquitous Language shared by devs and domain experts.
